name: Bodycheck
summary:
Bodycheck is a medieval sports game for PS Vita with no rules against foul play, magic powers, and up to four teams on the pitch at once. It's fully multiplayer too, yes - up to four players locally, or head-to-head across the wider internet.

Punching, scratching, and general unnecessary roughness are all actively encouraged during play. Just remember to score more points than your opponents.
